posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
So I posted a build request for Yoda and got three different - but effective - variants: A Gnome Paladin (26)/Monk (9)/SD (5) [dexer with single wield kama], a Halfling Monk (21)/COT (12)/WM (7) and a Gnome Monk (11)/COT (10)/WM (19) [both single wield a Katana] .  I'm now looking for someone to threaten them.

PvP (gotta slay them Jedi)

Level cap - 40, playable all the way up

Race preference - Human, Half Elf or Elf

Class preference - At least 10 lvls of BG (he's a Sith)

Melee preference - dual wielder

Range preference - DEX archery

Weapon preference - wields a two-bladed sword

8) Maximum item enhancement - +5 environment

9) Spellcasting - not necessary, but if he's a caster, he blows stuff up.

10) Custom factors - none,  but would like AB of 40+ . . . Dev Crit if he can get an acceptable DC

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
I have three possible solutions for you Fist,

1) My "Darth Maul" build for lvl 40, this one will have the highest AB from all, typical build of a FTR/ BARD/ WM.

2) My "Death from one Thousand Cuts" build for lvl 40, now this one will have much greater defense and the AB/ DMG will be high anyway due to the natural 42 STR.

3) An atypical build with "Bard 17/ BG 13/ RDD 10" that utilizes Divine Might/ Shield & Bard Song/ Curse Song, to stay on the battlefield and slay his opponents. I might have to take 10 FTR lvls there instead of RDD if the feats aren't enough (dual-wielding).
That build will have the least amounts of raw power but a very good buffing potencial.

Darknight's Ranger idea is also very good.

Tell me what you think,
